name: Kevin V
subject: Welcome! Thank you for signin up
content: Hopefully you've already had a chance to get an idea on how discor works. If not, a great place to start is by uploading your first post! Try uploading an image or gif by dragging and dropping it in the main feed. Cheers!

name: Danielle Washington
subject: Maintenence Request
content: Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC.
